website_summaries.verdict: One of the best high altitude resistance masks to buy when you want the most levels of resistance.
pros: Features 16 different resistance level, each one representing a different altitude to challenge the respiratory system while exercising
Levels are easy to switch on the go
cons: Only comes with a couple of replacement mask filters in case of damage or overuse

customer_reviews.title: Just no
customer_reviews.text: I ordered this product because one of the parts of my elevation 2.0 mask got jacked up & they didn't offer replacement parts so I thought to give this mask a try.. I went running with it today & honestly it was the worst thing imaginable. I've wasted money so now I'm genuinely pi**ed. It isn't as secure as the Elevation Mask & doesn't fit as securely. If you're serious about running in a mask &/or actual sweat/jarring factor, I wouldn't recommend it.
customer_reviews.author: Kline

customer_reviews.title: Sparthos 1 - Soul Crusher 0
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this mask to train for the Spartan Beast race (nicknamed the Soul Crusher) held on Big Bear. I knew i needed some help with my breathing at such an altitude and this mask delivered! Being closer to 60 than 50 now I wasn't sure about completing the 12+ mile race. While I sure want the fastest person on the course, i did complete the race and have no doubt the Sparthos Training Mask helped me reach my goal!
customer_reviews.author: Randy K Buck

customer_reviews.title: Powerful!! 100000% Recommended
customer_reviews.text: I bought this for my BF and he's a personal trainer. He used it immediately and told me it was amazing how he felt more oxygen in his muscles and even though it takes a bit to adjust because of the intensity of breathing, it works wonders on him. It's a one size fit, I tried it on myself and what I love about it is how comfortable and adjustable it is. I was indecisive on whether to buy this one of another one out there that was a bit more expensive but come on, this one had the most positive comments and now that we've tried it, we will stick to this one!!. You won't regret it.
customer_reviews.author: Neine Rjs

customer_reviews.title: Changed Review: Lies...
customer_reviews.text: The Mask its self: (Will Share When I review My Free Workout Wrist Bands I was Told Id Get IF I Left a Review... Did that, No Wrist Bands Sent or Confirmed) Was told to leave a review and I would receive free Workout Wrist Bands. (Tricked Into Leaving a Review) -
customer_reviews.author: Alejandro

customer_reviews.title: but it broke apart pretty easily. Now I know not to use it ...
customer_reviews.text: this mask works very effectively and it broke during a football game, which even tho it was just flag football it was still my fault for wearing it. Her name was Laura I believe contacted me through email and was so nice about the situation and allowed me to be able to get a replacement mask which caught me off guard to be honest. I was so excited and sure enough received my new mask very quickly and I suggest anyone wanting a good quality mask for NON CONTACT training should get 1 of these for the next level training! And get it from This seller! I suggest hers to all my friends! Thank You so much once again!
customer_reviews.author: Jason Johnson

customer_reviews.title: The BEST and most affordable HIGH QUALITY elevation mask on the market!
customer_reviews.text: I've had my mask since May 2018. This is literally the BEST elevation mask on the market! The fit comfortable and snug. It has plenty of settings to make it more challenging and different. You can control the out AND in-flow! Very good quality especially for how affordable it is! I xv honestly say I've felt a noticeable decrease in recovery time after being "gassed." My G capacity has seem to have increased as I can hold my breath for longer periods of time. Look, do yourself a favor and get yours NOW! And follow @sparthosusa on IG. Who knows, you may even see me modeling on their page. @_nine45
customer_reviews.author: Nico

customer_reviews.title: Wash Well Before Wearing
customer_reviews.text: I had it on for 5 minute and didn't like how it smelled. Then i got a rash on my face. : (
customer_reviews.author: J. Brendan Ammann

customer_reviews.title: Worth the buy
customer_reviews.text: Amazing product , helps with breathing and fits perfect. Easy to adjust levels of breathing without taking it off.
customer_reviews.author: Kennedie Montoya

customer_reviews.title: Very  Disappointed
customer_reviews.text: I was shocked with how dirty the product was, with everything going on. Covid 19/ Pandemic. They was hair and spots on it maybe dandruff.
customer_reviews.author: vanessa giro

customer_reviews.title: Overpriced, and Under whelming.
customer_reviews.text: I'm extremely disappointed in how much I paid for this. The quality is cheap, the material probably even cheaper, and it's not enjoyable to wear while working out. I felt sick, shortness of breath, lightheaded, and extremely dizzy. I'm never buy one of these unless it ACTUALLY works. I want my money back.
customer_reviews.author: Max Rokitanski

customer_reviews.title: Interesting Gadget
customer_reviews.text: So I use this for when I work out at home, there's definitely a difference when wearing it and working out with it. The restricted airflow definitely feels like you're pushing yourself through a workout. Its comfortable on the ears where the straps lay, compact and easy to store. I'd recommend this, just not confident enough to wear out to the gym just yet, haha. A side note, this would make a great cosplay item for sure.
customer_reviews.author: Shwa

customer_reviews.title: Does not cover my face tightly
customer_reviews.text: I made a mistake of not trying the mask on once the return window was open. Unfortunately it is too late to return, and I cannot use it. The problem is that I have a relatively high bridge of my nose (nothing abnormal though), and the mask simply does not sit tightly. No matter how I adjust it, air leaks into my eyes. Not only this makes the mask inefficient, it also makes my glasses fog immediately, so I cannot walk/run. I think, they should have designed different masks for different face types rather than making a one-fit-all type.
customer_reviews.author: A. Meller

customer_reviews.title: Not as good as I hope it would be............
customer_reviews.text: I wanted to buy this to help in my running. I put it on to test it out and didn't feel a difference. Changed the setting and all the settings were the same. Also the mask didn't fit well air was coming in from the top of my nose.
customer_reviews.author: gt40hwy

customer_reviews.title: A serious breathing improvement tool
customer_reviews.text: I'm re-discovering long distance running and training takes dedication, patience, and altitude. 2 out of 3 doesn't get it and I live / work at 2000'. I'm working a training plan that includes speed intervals & tempo runs - and including this mask for the last 2 miles. I can already feel the difference breathing from an effort standpoint. The jury is out whether putting oxygen stress will increase my hematocrit and red cell count - which is what every long distance runner hopes for.
customer_reviews.author: Brendan F. McSheehy Jr.

customer_reviews.title: Not for runners
customer_reviews.text: I bought this because of the high reviews it got but ended up disappointed. Im sure its great for some exercises but I did not have any luck with it running. Product said it would stay in place and secure but did not for me. Into my first mile starting to work up a sweat it began to slide around on my face. I tightend up as much as I could but the sweat made it impossible to stay in place. Product felt very cheap as well for how much it cost but I could definitely tell it would work just not for running.
customer_reviews.author: El Jefe

customer_reviews.title: Not sure yet.
customer_reviews.text: So, the mask does what it is supposed to. But, either I have a defective one, or it is made in an inferior way. When looking at the front face of it, the right side adjustment arm snapped off. Should not have done that this soon. Perhaps, say, the 2000th time I made an adjustment? Maybe. But not this soon. I will reach out to the seller and then manufacture to see if they can and will help out.
customer_reviews.author: Jason

customer_reviews.title: Impressive Mask !
customer_reviews.text: I love this mask! I use it to train with my exercised induced asthma. It helps build resistance to workout your respiratory muscles and diaphragm. My asthma has improved and I started out by wearing it for 1 hour each day then I increased it accordingly. I'm starting with my local police academy soon and I cant wait to see how much better my performance has been ! Even if you're not active , this has helped my asthma out alot and I have tons of energy after just a few days of consistent use ! You wont be disappointed and dont listen to the big pharma critics about these not working because they DO !
customer_reviews.author: DeadSpaceGrave

customer_reviews.title: Only lasted 30 minutes and BROKE!
customer_reviews.text: Extremely disappointed, the slide lever to adjust the levels broke as I was running ON THE VERY first time I use the product after only have enough for today. I have use these before so I should’ve stuck to models I have used, but I like the design and the price point was OK. I guess that was my fault. Very cheap materials and not worth the money.
customer_reviews.author: Michael

customer_reviews.title: This works!
customer_reviews.text: You know I will tell you, there are a lot of people who are against this product. But as for me I totally love running and working out with this mask because it works. And to give you an idea who how it works. If you think about it this is meant for you lung expansion. And you don’t go to the gym thinking I’m just going to do the bar today and expect to get big with out any weighted resistance right. Same concept here with this mask and you lungs. You need an out side source to make you body to grow and develop.
customer_reviews.author: Errol

customer_reviews.title: This mask is the business 🔥
customer_reviews.text: For the money ! This mask is extremely cheap because the mask outperforms
customer_reviews.author: PEOPLES D Barber

customer_reviews.title: Hurts my nose and missing valves
customer_reviews.text: I got a big head. 7 3/4 so if you have a smaller head, it's better off. I messaged the manufacturer on both Facebook and email. I advised they are missing. It said it should come with two additional. Person is right, as it said in the simple manual. This did not and the clear zip bag had 0. its been over 24 hours and still no response. Overall, I may be the black sheep, but do not anticipate any help from the manufacturer.
customer_reviews.author: Jeremy T Hall

customer_reviews.title: Great workout mask but becareful
customer_reviews.text: This workout mask is great. But take your time when using. This mask is really intense. Please read the direction and understand how to use it. I would advise to start on the lowest level possible and slowly build your way up. First few times I used it I did a 30 min lift and I felt like i did 1 hour of cardio. Again read the directions carefully on how to use this mask is intense. Great mask overall
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: I wouldn’t recommend
customer_reviews.text: I got this last week and using it since then everyday for the workout, the product itself have few problems. For the money you pay for this mask expecting some good quality and durability is totally okay. Issues I noticed so far. 1. The mask doesn’t stay secured 2. The mask I received had small broken vent 3. Quality
customer_reviews.author: Shajin

customer_reviews.title: Great tool to train yourself to breath
customer_reviews.text: I've got this product knowing it does not provide the same affects as being in high altitude. But this product does help with breathing. I've used this while running and exercising on the Oculus Quest. Overall the product works well. The plastic around the nose and face are a bit firm which does some discomfort and also allows air to flow out. I believe the face mask would perform and feel better if the plastic was a little softer/form fitting. Saying all that, I still give this product a 4 star and will still continue to use this to improve my running and other workouts.
customer_reviews.author: CM

customer_reviews.title: practical use
customer_reviews.text: I like this product because it is practical in use. I use for work on the dock, walking, and will use it for the gym once it opens up. I want to expand the use of of my lungs and make them stronger. I am 66 and want to keep being fit for all sorts of activities which includes traveling to high altitude areas of the world.
customer_reviews.author: Hiloman

customer_reviews.title: Beware of getting used  instead of new.
customer_reviews.text: I'm 100% sure they sent me a used return. People think they are buying an air filter and return . This is over priced for what you get. Sparthos, you got me this time. BUT NEVER AGAIN. It fits extremely well and is comfortable. I cleaned it with alcohol and it's doing mostly what it's supposed to.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: It looks cool and works as advertised
customer_reviews.text: I am supposed to wear a mask at the gym. I was using a cloth mask that would get soaked and I could not breath. I pulled the air restrictors out of this mask and problem solved! As a long time smoker I didn't need any help not being able to breathe. This mask without the filter is great solution for my problem. Only complaint if have very large head is a bit uncomfortable but definitely usable.
customer_reviews.author: Paul Spencer

customer_reviews.title: Great little mask
customer_reviews.text: I bought this about a year ago to help get ready for a trip to the Himalayas. The pandemic cancelled the trip but I’ve kept using the mask. It’s good for training and it does make you work harder. I’ve tried other masks that cost more like the Vent and it doesn’t compare. If you want to use it for filter, just open the valves up all the way and put a cloth mask around it as a cover. It works great and it keeps you from sucking the cloth mask up your nose.
customer_reviews.author: Charlie Clark

customer_reviews.title: Good Quality Training Mask
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this mask to use during my workouts at the gym for safety purposes during this time. However after having used the mask a number of times during my workouts and especially my daily jogs, the mask has definitely boosted my endurance and has helped me to focus and control my breathing more. After having used the mask for two weeks consistently, I went for a jog without the mask on and my jog was significantly easier and my endurance has increased. Good tool to add to my workout arsenal!
customer_reviews.author: Enrique Ortiz

customer_reviews.title: The Best Mask Around
customer_reviews.text: I could not be happier with this mask and especially at a great cost. Excellent design, comfortable fit, excellent quality, packaging, and awesome case. Everything about this purchase was so well done. From the packaging to the item itself. I was very impressed and this is by far my favorite mask overall. I have tried others and more expensive specialty ones and they don't compare to this one. Great all around. I am ordering another one as soon as the solid black is back in stock.
customer_reviews.author: Music4life

customer_reviews.title: Great but Not Exactly What I Was Looking For.
customer_reviews.text: I was trying to find a great mask for my son to use during SAC camp during the COVID pandemic. Even though we tried to release the valves to give plenty of breathing room it still didn't provide enough air flow. (he isn't altitude training), I was trying to find a mask that he could use and play football. Other than that it was everything it stated it would be.
customer_reviews.author: Heather E.

customer_reviews.title: A Way to Break the Plateau
customer_reviews.text: First off, when I tried this with the preinstalled one valve, and boy did I under estimate myself. I had to take off for a moment to gasp for air. I started with all the vents closed but eventually had to open it up all the way to complete my run. A huge plus to this device is being able to sustain a high intensity heart rate. I usually average 140 bpm but this kept it towards 170 bpm. I also used this for a 50 miles bike ride.
customer_reviews.author: Brian Viengthong

customer_reviews.title: A-1
customer_reviews.text: This thing is intense sheesh u will definitely have stronger lungs for sure and breathe way better with ease after taking it off but I suggest u practice with it on in the house just breathing in it first to get use to the levels because u will pass out if u don't practice with inside your home first before actually doing any workouts or running this mask is the real deal and not to just jump right into please be smart about working out with this mask
customer_reviews.author: Prince

customer_reviews.title: A worthy substitute for a participation trophy
customer_reviews.text: The idea that the product tries to achieve is worth a 5 star review, but the review is all based on results and this mask fails in the simplest of tests. I could not get it to seal around my nose after the 2nd use, thus rendering this product as nothing more than a landfill item. An instant before I did my best MJ impersonation and slammed this in the garbage, I realized that this could double as a jock strap for the youth. I was going to give this piece of junk a 2nd life by donating it, but tragedy struck in the form of the Boy Scouts going bankrupt.
customer_reviews.author: Jose L Torre

customer_reviews.title: Mask worth investing.
customer_reviews.text: The mask is a great exercise tool to improve your workout routine! Also, it has different levels to increase your workout intensity. Furthermore, it is washable and very comfortable. The downside is this mask isn’t one size fits all. I’m 5’6 and the mask fits well. However, whenever I move a lot like doing jumping jacks, the mask tends to move downward which leaves my nose more difficult to breath. Therefore, I constantly need to adjust it.
customer_reviews.author: Triony Valdivia-Cazzol

customer_reviews.title: Quite exceptional save for one tiny detail...
customer_reviews.text: This mask is awesome! It's truly leveled up my training in several areas (more pull ups then ever before, I shaved off 1 minute and 13 seconds off a 1.5 mile run, and more). My only issue with the mask is that the force of my exhalation seems to push the mask off my face enough that I'm losing some of the effect. If I am able to just hold the mask against my face, I can really feel my lungs having to work but often during exertion the air leakage is significant.
customer_reviews.author: Alex R.

customer_reviews.title: Not super impressed with the adjustability of this product.
customer_reviews.text: Let me preface with the fact that I live at 6,800 ft. That being said maybe the adjustability of the device is affected by altitude. I was not impressed with the adjustability of this device. I am a fairly fit individual and this device is seems to be either all or nothing. I tried every setting and above the easy levels it is extremely difficult to breath. I even tried weightlifting and running. It hindered my performance in every way. The mask is very comfortable to wear for extended periods of time.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Lil pricy but worth it
customer_reviews.text: This mask is great! Eadily cleanable, in the few days i started wearing it it took some adjustments, even for the first level. But after that i felt i could breath more. I don't know if that makes sense but thatd what it felt like after wearing it for a couple. Easily adjustable and form fitting you could input a small mask for use in the gyms in these dire times! Don't go off my word alone, highly sugguest to try it yourself. I was skeptic too but honestly now recommend it if you want a good training mask.
customer_reviews.author: Stone

customer_reviews.title: Not Exactly what I Thought
customer_reviews.text: This mask was not what I was looking for after all. It has been about six months (now that gyms have finally reopened here) since I've done an intense workout. With masks required in gyms, I thought this would be a good mask to have. It turns out, it's not what I was looking for right now. I believe I'm not up to the cardiovascular conditioning to get the benefits from it. I also had a few claustrophobic moments while wearing it. It's not a bad mask as far as quality or fit. I think it will suit me once I get back up to the condition I was in before the pandemic hit.
customer_reviews.author: RM.

customer_reviews.title: Not really worth $50
customer_reviews.text: Not really worth $50. It does restrict breathing and pretty comfortable when on. Plastic seemed to stretch out right around the time the return window closed. Probably better if these were offered in different sizes for a better seal. I would say more like a $15-20 value
customer_reviews.author: DENISE T GUERRERO

customer_reviews.title: Good mask, but keep it clean
customer_reviews.text: It is a good mask with minimal leakage. It is adjustable, but it didn't always seem like the levers were working. For those of you who have never used a mask, it takes some incredible patience to get used to it. Might be better to start walking with it for a couple of weeks before progressing up to higher intensity. I would recommend keeping it really clean as the amount of bacteria growing in one of these masks is unbelievable.
customer_reviews.author: Thomas P. Grotenhuis

customer_reviews.title: Kicking it to the next Level!
customer_reviews.text: I got this after reading the Oxygen Advantage to help me with my training and endurance. I'm 62yrs young and need to maximize my workouts but minimize the impact on my body. The Sparta mask does just that! I'm able to get the aerobic intensity I want without the pounding on my body. I'm able to recover faster and have improved all of my times and intensity of my workouts. GET THIS MASK IT WORKS!!
customer_reviews.author: PPP

customer_reviews.title: Cool mask
customer_reviews.text: Great mask. I use it for work. I get lots of compliments on how awesome it looks. Kids that see me with it on at the stores ask where I got it. Breathing with it takes getting used too. But fits well. I will order another one soon. I did not give it a five because the cap for the filter fell off and I emailed the seller and I did not get a response on how to replace the cap.
customer_reviews.author: Roderick Pascua

customer_reviews.title: A useful training aid
customer_reviews.text: I was looking for a mask to wear while running (due to covid-19) when I saw this. I am also a freediver, and when I read about it I thought it would be a useful training tool. I mean, increased hypoxia and hypercapnia tolerance and increased strength...it sounded ideal. I have been experimenting with it while working out and practicing yoga. I love it. It fits a niche between normal workouts and working out while holding your breath (which is pretty darned hard!). Time will tell if it supports gains in hypoxic and hypercapnic tolerance, but so far I am very happy with it.
customer_reviews.author: Jeff A.

customer_reviews.title: Great but ...
customer_reviews.text: Beginner here- so far I love this mask! I’m really excited for it to take my endurance to the next level but it’s frustrating because I’ve only used it a few times and the tightest it goes around the back of my head isnt tight enough. I don’t have a small head and regularly buy/wear men’s baseball caps so I’m not sure why the fit is on the larger side... Other then that I’m excited to continue wearing it and hopefully eventually I won’t die when I wear it.
customer_reviews.author: Kelsi

customer_reviews.title: Disappointed
customer_reviews.text: Very disappointed, doesn’t fit my face I just received yesterday I heard very good reviews but I don’t see it, will be returning.
customer_reviews.author: Davon Dorsey

customer_reviews.title: Great Buy
customer_reviews.text: My mask arrived yesterday and I tried it for the first time today at the gym. It was definitely a great buy. This mask is one that definitely helps to increase the strength of your lungs. The mask causes your lungs to work harder, which may take some getting use to, but I appreciate this. After about a month, a can definitely see my lung capacity increasing.
customer_reviews.author: Gerald Rios

customer_reviews.title: Does what it is advertised to do.
customer_reviews.text: Even with the lowest setting and only one filter plugged it, it makes you breathe harder while working out. I noticed I burned many more calories while I wore it working out, per my Fitbit.
customer_reviews.author: Joe Arch

customer_reviews.title: Works well
customer_reviews.text: I used it to train for 3 day mountain biking ride in canyons of Utahs White Rim Trail. We did 30miles a day and camping at 5000ft elevation. I live in flat Atlanta. My first mountain biking ride with very experienced riders. I did it without being a safety risk. Dirt, rocks, head winds challenged my body. I'm 43 yrs old at 307lbs generally spending 6 to 8 hrs a week on the gym occasionally running a 10k or 5k. So yeah get this and train.
customer_reviews.author: Antoine J. Davenport

customer_reviews.title: Give your body the proper breathing pattern it deserves!
customer_reviews.text: I have to say, I was specifically about training in one of these, but after only ONE day, about an hour in the mask, my lungs and breathing pattern feels stronger. I sweat so much more using this, and I actually won one of the Sparthis freebies on the scratch off that is included with the mask. They also offer you to win up to a $100 amazon card. I will put the level up one every week and train 30-45 min a day in the mask. However , using it outside is tough because of the heat, I usually use this inside for my home ab workouts as well as my at home dip station. Impressed !
customer_reviews.author: James Martini

customer_reviews.title: Used
customer_reviews.text: Absolutely disgusting, this product had BEARD hairs and skin oil residue in it when I opened it up.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: That this mask fits  well and really works
customer_reviews.text: Really like this mask. It controls your breathing and make you sweat Really fast. There's 4 levels of controlling your breathing with number one being the easiest so you can breathe through easily and as you know how to control the one that your on then you can move on to the next. I love this mask I use it for working out, running, and even for covid19.
customer_reviews.author: Javere

customer_reviews.title: Just Pay attention to the description
customer_reviews.text: I bought mine but had to return it and sadly won’t be buying another one. When it came the filter piece was broken and this mask was not what I intended it for. Description was alittle iffy so I couldn’t get what I wanted. Seller was great with returning and no issues. Very very hard to breathe so pay attention to what your buying
customer_reviews.author: Joe VanEpps

customer_reviews.title: Very challenging workout!
customer_reviews.text: I have the feeling that this product will definitely help me to improve my overall cardiovascular condition. It has different levels of difficultly. Just be careful in case your condition is not very good because you may have trouble breathing while working out and make sure you concentrate in your breathing.
customer_reviews.author: enap348

customer_reviews.title: Greay value for the price! Definitely works!
customer_reviews.text: The mask definitly increases the intensity of my cardio. I primarily use it during my inital cardio and less often during subsequent weights, but it works well for both. I like how lightweight it is and how quickly I can adjust the difficulty level. The only small issue with it is that the strap is a little loose on me, so when I exhale, air can escape around the seal instead of through the valve (with two valves in).
customer_reviews.author: Sarah

customer_reviews.title: The other reviews about it not fitting well around the nose are right.
customer_reviews.text: So I've used it 3 times now and tried adjusting it any way I can but to no avail. I've read in the reviews and people have said that it didn't fit well near the nose and when you breathed out you would feel air escaping near where it fits around your nose. I have the same problem and it doesn't help how there is only one size for it and it supposedly "one size fits all". I've used various types of masks and respirators and have never had this type of problem.
customer_reviews.author: christopher vera

customer_reviews.title: Not for running
customer_reviews.text: I initially bought this for running but even on the easiest setting it's nearly impossible to do a slow jog for this competitive runner. I just can't get enough oxygen in, while the strong exhale pushes the mask off the face. I could see this working if you just use it for lifting weights or slow walks.
customer_reviews.author: esb

customer_reviews.title: Deceptive ,  not a protective product.
customer_reviews.text: These people are deceptive in their advertising. They infer that it offers n-95 level covid-19 protection. The truth is it doesn't. Its just a housing with adjustable air flow valves. After I received it They suggest inserting a n95 filter in the housing.
customer_reviews.author: Dominique  Black

customer_reviews.title: It checks all of my criteria
customer_reviews.text: So far so good. I have been reading for th m last two weeks in various humid climates and it holds up well. The key question i ask myself for this product is whether I would buy this product again or not. The answer is yes. Additionally there customer support is very responsive and user friendly.
customer_reviews.author: James Smith

customer_reviews.title: Hard to adjust air valves
customer_reviews.text: I like the mask design, but I am displeased with the adjustment of airflow: it's not the easiest. It takes a while to learn how to adjust the air valves in a way that it is easier to breathe when you workout. There is a user guide provided, and I followed the steps, however, it still is not working according to their direction.
customer_reviews.author: Jasmina

customer_reviews.title: Useful and stylish
customer_reviews.text: Im actually using the mask for going out in public. Much more preferable to surgical masks or bandanas. It's off label, but it makes a statement. I already have compromised breathing so the mask itself, technically helps me breathe correctly. However I recommend making the straps adjustable for big melonheads like me.
customer_reviews.author: Michael Zacchea

customer_reviews.title: It gets sweaty and gross! It's made with cheap plastic
customer_reviews.text: I was NOT impressed...It feels like breathing inside a plastic bag...AIR escapes on the sides... Plastic was "FOLDED" -- it's JUST CHEAP! BAD BAD BAD! -- I wore it once and it got so disgustingly sweaty I felt like throwing up...so I guess it's great for losing weight?
customer_reviews.author: Dr. DieuDonné

customer_reviews.title: Good but not quite
customer_reviews.text: Only one of my valves work the other just slides to the highest setting to the point where I had to remove the filter. This was out of the box so maybe I just got a defective one.
customer_reviews.author: Marshall Shelley

customer_reviews.title: Improving strength of lungs and it works!
customer_reviews.text: I'm wanting to improving the strength of my lungs. I thought I'd give this a try if I'm impressed. The mask is comfortable and secure, similar to a 3m mask. Dials on the front move easy to adjust how much you can inhale and exhale. I can feel improvement just during passive everyday activities.
customer_reviews.author: The DL

customer_reviews.title: The division
customer_reviews.text: Wow this is something that work out perfectly great for breathing, walking, running, and taking to work, everybody at work wants one buy your own unless the company gives me a discount but overall if it had a filter and the plastic didn't come apart from the front it would be great thanks.
customer_reviews.author: Jon b.

customer_reviews.title: Doesn't seal well enough
customer_reviews.text: It doesn't seal to the face well enough so every time I exhale the mask comes away from my face and shoots a stream of air directly up into my left eye. Also, the plastic air restrictor part on the inside ends up pressing against my chin and is uncomfortable. It gets worse the sweatier you get. The problem comes down to the rubber seal material not being robust enough, too flimsy, doesn't have the compressible springiness needed to make a proper seal. I will put something inside around the edge to try and make up for it but my hopes aren't high. Would also be nice if the straps had more adjustability, seem designed for a big head.
customer_reviews.author: VanRadnor

customer_reviews.title: Get it!!! You’ll thank me
customer_reviews.text: Absolutely great!!! Definitely improved my workout and after I was done and had taken the mask off I could immediately feel the difference and felt the depth of my breathing improve. Oddly enough it was easier to breathe running than walking. My only complaint is that it can slip a little and your mouth can block the airway. Then you’re left with that mask suction cupped to your face. Nonetheless, looking forward to my next workout with it.
customer_reviews.author: Ben

customer_reviews.title: Drastically increases endurance/stamina
customer_reviews.text: This product serves the purpose and a bargain for the price. It's not for the faint of heart. It's a challenge and a test of will power to train using this altitude mask. Your workouts will be intense, uncomfortable, and your lungs feel on fire, but the results are amazing. You'll be running circles farther and faster around the competition. I highly recommend incorporating the Sparthos altitude mask with any training regimen.
customer_reviews.author: Rick Apodaca

customer_reviews.title: Beneficially worth the buy
customer_reviews.text: Working out with this mask is intense as hell yet so beneficial. You are practically forced to breathe properly when your heart rate is through the roof. I'm a big guy and I'm sure you know how it is for us and breathing during workouts. I highly recommend this product for anyone aiming to repair their cardiovascular system.
customer_reviews.author: Udoka

customer_reviews.title: Weird smell
customer_reviews.text: I'm not really happy with this product. Unfortunately it has a really strange oder.
customer_reviews.author: Nate

customer_reviews.title: Trash.
customer_reviews.text: The outgoing air valve broke for me literally before I even put the thing on. Snapped off right after I took the thing out of the box. Looks like it was glued on with elmers glue. I glued it back on with gorilla glue, and after using it 3 times the other valve, (air intake valve) comes loose after every sprint I do. I would never pay more than 5 dollars for an item like this. 50 dollars is ludicrous.
customer_reviews.author: jbm1515

customer_reviews.title: For training purposes only
customer_reviews.text: Not for people looking to make this a mask for basic workouts. This is meant to train with
customer_reviews.author: Iris Lemus

customer_reviews.title: Worth every penny!
customer_reviews.text: The mask is such a great tool to make my workouts more effective. I’ve been using it everyday I workout. I have used it for sprints and agility drills as well as different kettle bell and body weight workouts. Definitely works as advertised and I started with the recommended beginner level. My cardio and lung strength has definitely been increasing because of the Sparthos Mask. I have already recommended to friends. Only thing that bothers me is once I get a real sweat going it can start to shift a lot depending on my workout. Otherwise, it’s been great
customer_reviews.author: Emmanuel Lovejoy Laryea

customer_reviews.title: Virus mask
customer_reviews.text: I like the fit and I retrofitted it to protect me from virus. I place a shop towel as a filter inside the mask. I look like a badass and I am protected
customer_reviews.author: Angelo Christiano III

customer_reviews.title: Workout Only
customer_reviews.text: I specifically was using the his for the pandemic since I work at the warehouse. Only issue which is not a big one, more personal I have to deal with is the pool of sweat hitting the mask. The functions of the mask is really good however I'll stick to using this for workouts only, since it only meant to train your breathing during a workout session.
customer_reviews.author: Yasakani

customer_reviews.title: Great Oxygen Mask!
customer_reviews.text: I am very impressed with the efficiency of the mask. It's helped my training quite a bit. I also thought the levels were not gonna be very restrictive. And to my reality, they are. The quality of the mask and the band around the head is also good quality. So far so good. No complaints. Thank you Sparthos!
customer_reviews.author: SUPER Buyer

customer_reviews.title: It works.
customer_reviews.text: Works like it should. However mine broke disassembling it to wash it after a few workouts. Can’t get replacement parts just have to order a new one. I glued it back together. Works for now. Everything is good it’s to bad you can’t get replacement parts.
customer_reviews.author: Sean P.

customer_reviews.title: The Virus
customer_reviews.text: My dad is using it, and he's loving how it works. Quick note though, we conformed the mask with a filter, and modified it a bit to fit all of it. You know, the situation with covid-19? Either way, it's working past expectations, we're planning on getting another one for me, after the covid-19 thing calms down. So that I may use it for when I exercise, as is intended.
customer_reviews.author: Sol

customer_reviews.title: Great buy, may need sleeve replaced due to overuse.
customer_reviews.text: The Sparthos training mask has improved my endurance tremendously. I love it! Would’ve given 5 stars but after a few uses (daily) the top strap of the sleeve feels too elastic and slips down. However that may be because short hair doesn’t provide a lot of friction lol. It works out because I would like to purchase different sleeve designs. Overall I’m very satisfied with my purchase.
customer_reviews.author: Anna

customer_reviews.title: Highly effective product
customer_reviews.text: This is my very first mask for workout, I wasn't sure how this will feel once I put it on, it works very well...although I do recommend that anyone using this mask for workout, start slow don't crank it up to the highest elevation..take you time and get your lungs to adjust over periods of time..
customer_reviews.author: Ben Tensay

customer_reviews.title: Comfortable
customer_reviews.text: Bought this thanks to Covid and requirements for a mask. Could not stand a cloth mask on my face while working out so I bought this to try out. It does feel a ton better and gives your mouth freedom. So far I have kept it on its lowest setting and I really like it. It fits really nice, it’s easily cleanable and it looks better than a medical mask or underwear mask. The company even emailed me asking if I liked it and they reply back to emails within minutes which is awesome. Shows you they care about their products. I do recommend for working out.
customer_reviews.author: Kerrah W.

customer_reviews.title: A mushroom for mario
customer_reviews.text: Sometimes I have to place it alittle higher on the chin when you need to deep heavy breath but overall an awesome product ..feel like it takes my training to a professional level .. and that's only on level 1 .. it's seriously teaches your body to deal better with every little bit of oxygen .. if you wanna take training to THAT level.. get you a training mask imo
customer_reviews.author: Akh

customer_reviews.title: Sweat+heat make the fabric loose
customer_reviews.text: This works fine for short exercise routines, but going for 30+minutes of high intensity or a long 6+ mile run the elasticity doesn't do as well and it starts sliding easily. I like the idea and what it does though. I'll (and you might too) shop around for others.
customer_reviews.author: Ian Derrington

customer_reviews.title: Reasonable Product
customer_reviews.text: It is difficult to jog a mile with this mask at level 1. If I can do that with mask, without mask it feels like I can jog 2 to 3 miles. It will absolutely increase the cardio strength but not recommended for people with underlying ailments or health condition.
customer_reviews.author: GOGINENI AVINASH

customer_reviews.title: Workout for the lungs
customer_reviews.text: I do high-intensity workouts. It took me time to adapt to the Spartan mask, I am still on the first level and to be honest, I can't breathe if I am running (HR 150+), I can tolerate the mask if I am rowing or doing weights. I would recommend if you really want to increase your endurance. One last note, this mask is not made to protect you from Corona Virus so don't rely on it if you want to purchase it for that cause.
customer_reviews.author: YOUSEE

customer_reviews.title: Good mask for training.
customer_reviews.text: I had to replace my other mask. I am originally from Colorado so the atmosphere he I. Iowa is a little different. I am used to working out in Colorado. So I wanted my body to work out just as hard here. I’ve used it a few times lately. The mask does just that and I am beyond satisfied with its performance.
customer_reviews.author: Mikey Sams

customer_reviews.title: Does the job
customer_reviews.text: It has been a series of 95 degree plus days in my town, so I have limited my use as the struggle for cooling is real. I have used the mask indoors, and it does add a level of intensity to my limited workout. Looking forward to using it outside, and more often.
customer_reviews.author: Cars

customer_reviews.title: Does not fit correctly without some jimmy rigging for small head
customer_reviews.text: Would have given it five stars. Does not fit properly. After some jimmy rigging it seemed to work much better. Have a small head size. Had to rubber band it on top. Also not the best if you have a beard. Works better with more of a clean shaven face. Besides that it’s sweet. Would get another one. I love at 7000 feet, ride and hike up to 12,000. This adds a punch. Hahahah
customer_reviews.author: marshall

customer_reviews.title: Works well in terms of air adjustment and fit
customer_reviews.text: Seems to be a good quality item and have used for hiking/climbing/exercising - but not jogging - and works well, does not slip. Occasional seal breaks around nose, mostly due to heavy exhalations but can usually tighten or adjust on face to resolve.
customer_reviews.author: manray

customer_reviews.title: Comfortable mask, very user friendly
customer_reviews.text: I've been using the training mask while riding my trek 10 speed. I used to be able to ride a particular section in just above 15 minutes and kind of plateau'd there. After riding for almost 2 weeks with the mask on, I decided to try to ride without it, and I managed to do the same section in just under 15 minutes. I can only imagine this is due to my expanded lung capacity allowing me to pedal harder for longer.
customer_reviews.author: Jonnie

customer_reviews.title: Great product
customer_reviews.text: Love the product. I used to live in Colorado and climbed 14ers regularly. As far as restricting oxygen to achieve the desired altitude it works great. My only issue is you can tell its artificial. Sometimes it feels like I'm fighting the mask itself to get the air. instead of the air just being restricted. Not sure how you get away from that in a mask, but if you're wondering if it perfectly matches altitude it. Doesn't because you don't have to deal with the suction feeling of the mask when hiking.
customer_reviews.author: Rowdy Lofton

customer_reviews.title: had to fix by using sponges.
customer_reviews.text: i needed to add sponges on the left and right at the top by the nose. air gets in and out. after I added the sponges it was great.
customer_reviews.author: James

customer_reviews.title: Great addition to a training routine or just something to up your game!
customer_reviews.text: Pretty impressed! I’ve been curious and wanting to try an altitude mask for awhile. The first time wearing it I could only ride about 5 minutes. As someone who is in great shape but struggles at higher altitudes I think this is going to be a great asset to my training.
customer_reviews.author: Sarah Ault

customer_reviews.title: Better fit please?
customer_reviews.text: Not much to say, overall the mask is good. Would only wish they add some kind of hold, fixation, since during hot days and extensive runs/cycling tours the mask, due to sweat is losing grip and need to shortly focus to readjust it. Yet on the long run isn't an constant solution. Maybe is just me or my head is too small. XD But this would in some kind, make it even more flexible and adaptable. On the other hand, easy to handle/clean, looks cool and fit is comfortable. Skoal
customer_reviews.author: Vael Steve

customer_reviews.title: Husbands joke buy makes me a beast
customer_reviews.text: My husband bought this as a joke the day after our city mandated masks for Covid. I ended up stealing it and using it for workouts. It makes me feel like Rocky training to fight Drago. It has different settings, as well. Love it.
customer_reviews.author: Erica

customer_reviews.title: Best product for the value
customer_reviews.text: The build quality of Sparthos work mask is good and comfortable, its come breathable cloth and really like the color military camo. Its come with extra pair of filter values, its has adjustable air flow control. I’m using this as my daily workout mask to control my breathing at intense workout. The material around the nose and mouth is very soft and comfortable.
customer_reviews.author: Nivas

customer_reviews.title: So glad I bought this!
customer_reviews.text: I am climbing Mount Kilimanjaro next year and there's really no way to train for the altitude outside of this mask. My doctor recommended getting a mask like this. It is a high quality, well fitting mask. I love the multiple settings that change the 'altitude' per se according to the loss of oxygen. I think it will make all the difference in the world for my trek in Africa!
customer_reviews.author: Julie Jaeger

customer_reviews.title: This thing really works!
customer_reviews.text: This mask will definitely help me achieve my goal of becoming a better overall runner. Even on the lowest setting, a lot of energy is exhumed from using this product. Only downside is that you’ll look kinda weird and attract some stares while running with this thing on outside or at the gym. But overall great product that I will recommend to others.
customer_reviews.author: R. M. Burey

customer_reviews.title: Outstanding Training Mask
customer_reviews.text: I used the Mask as soon as it came in. Went for a weighted hike of roughly 6 miles with 3 miles mask on and 3 miles mask off. Used the lowest setting and it was a great but challenging workout. You can feel the difference from training with it one then seeing how you perform with it off. Great seal around the nose and mouth and comfortable. Best training masks I’ve been able to find to date.
customer_reviews.author: Mike

customer_reviews.title: No the most comfortable but so effective
customer_reviews.text: If you’re trying to take your training to the next level this thing helps. It has helped me drastically and I love it. However, after wearing it, my ears will get sore from it. I love it never the less and recommend you if your new, not to just jump into. Train smart and properly with it or else you can hurt yourself. It’s not a toy.
customer_reviews.author: D

product_meta.title: Sparthos Workout Mask - High Altitude Elevation Simulation - for Gym, Cardio, Fitness, Running, Endurance and HIIT Training [16 Breathing Levels]
feature_bullets: ✅ CUT YOUR WORKOUT TIME IN HALF! - Training Mask by SPARTHOS makes workouts more effective by simulating high altitude. It will force you to take full and deeper breaths, toughening your diaphragm and respiratory system.
✅ UNLOCK THE CHAMPION IN YOU – Breathe efficiently and reach unmatched endurance. Less fatigue, hardened body, more energy after training.

✅ PROVEN RESULTS, PROVEN TECHNOLOGY - SPARTHOS Workout Mask is anatomically designed, cutting edge technology to energize any sport - cardio, gym, running, cycling or aerobic exercises. Simulate altitude training and exercise your breathing anywhere.
✅ AMPLIFY THE INTENSITY! – 16(!) breathing levels at your disposal - from beginner to pro. Change air flow intensity during workouts. No need to take your mask off!
✅ GET IT. ADD TO CART. BE LEGENDARY. - You have no risk with our 100% satisfaction guarantee.

specifications.Customer Reviews: /** Fix for UDP-1061.
